meaningMnemonic: This word uses 長 in the same way as 社長, where it means something like "boss" or "manager." So, this 長 is the boss of the <kanji>station</kanji>, right? What do you call someone like that? You call them the <vocabulary>stationmaster</vocabulary> (that is, unless you want to be thrown to the trains).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
